title: Privacy Policy
intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Speexify collects, uses, discloses, and protects your information when you use our website and services. By using the platform, you consent to the practices described in this policy.
s1_p1: We may collect the following types of information:
s1_li1: Account information (such as name, email address, phone number, and password)
s1_li2: Profile and learning-related information you provide on the platform
s1_li3: Communications (messages you send to us, support requests, feedback)
s1_li4: Technical data (IP address, device type, browser type, operating system, and usage logs)
s1_li5: Cookies and similar technologies (as described below)
s2_li1: Provide and operate the platform and deliver digital services
s2_li4: Improve platform performance, security, and user experience
s2_li5: Communicate with you about updates, service-related notices, and support
s2_li6: Comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms
s3_p1: Payments on Speexify are processed through Paymob and other authorized payment providers. We do not store your full card details on our servers.
s3_p2: Payment providers may collect and process payment-related information (such as card details) according to their own privacy and security practices. We may receive confirmation details such as payment status, transaction reference, and basic billing information when necessary for record-keeping and support.
s4_p1: We may use cookies and similar technologies to:
s4_li1: Keep you signed in and maintain session security
s4_li2: Remember preferences such as language selection
s4_li3: Analyze usage patterns to improve the platform
s4_p2: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect certain features of the platform.
s5_p1: Depending on applicable law, you may have the right to:
s5_li1: Request access to the personal data we hold about you
s5_li2: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
s5_li3: Request deletion of your account and personal data, subject to legal and contractual requirements
s5_li4: Object to or request restriction of certain processing activities
s5_p2: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details below.
